Hi Elliott - 

I can see why you though Akasaka-something but if not that, =
look at Akao group perhaps. I'm not coming up with any positive thoughts he=
re, just throwing out some idea. Doesn't look Kyo-sukashi to me. As for Ech=
izen...Echizen what? Echizen makes me think Kinai and that's not Kinai work=
 from what I can tell. Nice tsuba. The fukurin could be added later so I gu=
ess one should think of it "without" that addition.

Ron
STL

  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: Elliott

ent: Monday, July 16, 2007 6:28 PM
  Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: It is very=
 quiet here


  I am still here! 

  After thumbing thru many books and web=
 sites, I have decided to name 
  my mysterious Tsuba (the one mounted on m=
y Hiramasa) Echizen Sukashi. 
  If you go to my album (Elliott's Album) and=
 look at photo's 1 thru 7, 
  tell me if you agree or what you think.

  I =
first thought Kyo-sukashi but Gordon said "I don't think so." Then 
  I was=
 leaning towards Akasaka but the Fukurin was telling me "no". So 
  I threw=
 my hands up and pondered other stuff.

  It wasn't until I was 'talking' t=
o Andy Quirt when I ask him and he 
  suggested Echizen. I hadn't thought o=
f that but I went to searching 
  and maybe............it is!

  What do yo=
u think?

  Elliott
